title: Functions Modeling Change: Preparation for Calculus 4th Connally
description:
Functions Modeling Change: A Preparation for Calculus, 4th Edition (c2011), textbook by Eric Connally, Deborah Hughes-Hallett, Andrew M. Gleason et al.

TEXTBOOK INFO: Google these 2 keywords together: Wiley productCd-EHEP001848
(ISBN-13: 9780470484746 hc)

CONTENTS:
---------
1. Linear Functions and Change
2. Functions
3. Quadratic Functions
4. Exponential Functions
5. Logarithmic Functions
6. Transformations of Functions and Their Graphs
7. Trigonometry in Circles and Triangles
8. The Trigonometric Functions
9. Trigonometric Identities and Their Applications
10. Compositions, Inverses, and Combinations of Functions
11. Polynomial and Rational Functions
12. Vectors
13. Sequences and Series
14. Parametric Equations and Conic Sections

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked, true PDF.

COMMENT: Aka Precalculus. Produced by the Calculus Consortium and initially funded by a National Science Foundation Grant.
